description: The file is an HTML document that provides the user interface for a database visualization tool, including layout, styling, and embedded JavaScript for dynamic interactions with the backend API.

methods.name: showLoading
methods.description: Displays a loading message in a specified element.

methods.name: showError
methods.description: Displays an error message in a specified element.

methods.name: showEmptyState
methods.description: Displays an empty state message in a specified element.

methods.name: setActiveState
methods.description: Sets the active state on an element matching a selector.

methods.name: fetchData
methods.description: Performs a fetch request to a given API endpoint and returns parsed JSON data.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of databases and populates the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list, resetting current selections.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses the database's table list and loads tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches and displays tables for the selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and renders data from the selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Generates HTML to display the data table with handling for wide content.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Creates HTML for individual cell values, with expandable object or long string handling.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Toggles expanded view of cell content, parsing JSON objects if necessary.
